articles.title: "Disqualification Notice Justified": Maharashtra Deputy Speaker To Supreme Court
articles.description: There is "no better way to reward defection than offering its leader the post of Chief Minister," Shiv Sena Chief Whip Sunil Prabhu has told the Supreme Court ahead of tomorrow's big hearing over the political crisis in the state.
articles.content:
Eknath Shinde was "hand-in-glove with the BJP all along," wrote the Chief Whip.

articles.title: Explained: What are cloudbursts, and why they occur more in places like Amarnath
